div.h2: CARIN RTPBC Billing Units Code System

div.p: This code system defines the quantity units of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-billing-units defines the following codes:

tr.td: Quantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of grams
Quantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of milliliters
Quantity unit of measure for products billed as individual items (e.g., tablets)

title.value: CARIN RTPBC Billing Units Code System

description.value: This code system defines the quantity units of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products.

definition.value: Quantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of grams
